fields.name: DiskSizeGB
fields.description:
Specifies the size of the operating system disk in gigabytes. This element can be used to overwrite the size of the disk in a virtual machine image.

This value cannot be larger than 1023 GB

fields.name: Image
fields.description: The Source User Image VirtualHardDisk. This VirtualHardDisk will be copied before using it to attach to the Virtual Machine. If SourceImage is provided, the destination VirtualHardDisk should not exist.

fields.name: VhdContainers
fields.description: The list of virtual hard disk container uris.

fields.name: WriteAcceleratorEnabled
fields.description: Specifies whether writeAccelerator should be enabled or disabled on the disk.
